content.prompt: The ideas expressed in the excerpt most strongly suggest which of the following about how Native Americans responded to colonization?

choices.label: They befriended European traders and settlers.
They resisted European efforts to repress their culture.
They suffered from European diseases to which they had no immunity.
They allied with Europeans against rival native groups.

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans
